headline: Why Analysts Think Qualcomm’s Story Is Shifting With New AI Deals And Mixed Wall Street Targets
summary: Qualcomm’s latest narrative update nudges its price target higher, with fair value holding near $191.80 per share. A slightly lower discount rate and steady revenue growth expectations reflect growing confidence in its multi year AI and diversification strategy. Bulls point to premium Android momentum, auto and IoT expansion, and early AI accelerator wins as reasons for this incremental optimism. Skeptics warn that AI enthusiasm and the semiconductor cycle could still inject volatility into...
